ValidationRule.description: If you fill the name of unregistered corporate, walkin source should be 'corporate(unregistered)'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Name_of_Unregistered_Corporate__c ) ) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Walkin_Source__c , 'Corporate(Unregistered)') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Walkin source should be 'Corporate(unregistered)' , when you fill the Name of Unregistered Corporate.
